item.description:
6/22/11

Everything but 6 pm was sold out.

I have rescheduled this Meet Up for 6 pm.

Please note this time change.

I do not know how long until the 6 pm will also be sold out.

Mike B

Pay a haunted visit to Mark Twain's rambling old home.

Hear about (and maybe hear) spooky noises; listen to tales of reported sightings, paranormal probes - and Twain's own interest in the uncanny.

Tickets,

$18 Non members

$15 members;

Reservations required so call this number 860-280-3130

You are responsible for making your own Reservation and payment.

I do not want to make a reservation for someone that will Back down at the last minute.

Sponsored by Tsunami Tsolutions

http://www.marktwainhouse.org/visitor/events_programs.php

www.marktwainhouse.org/visitor/events_programs.php

Who wants to take a tour of the Mark Twain House & Museum?

http://www.marktwainhouse.org/

www.marktwainhouse.org/

Is the Mark Twain House really Haunted? Remember, this is a Ghost tour, not an investigation. Though some of us might sense something from a common tour. We can talk about car pooling if you are interested in going.

Small EVPs can be brought on the ghost tours.

Cannot do in Mark Twain House;

take photos 

chew gum

write with a pen

touch anything except for stair hand rails
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes. I will have my purple backpack.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone Goes on Mark Twain's House Graveyard Shift Ghost Tours
